content: **gauge ** 7 single_crochet row = 3 6 single_crochet row = 2 **notes from pattern ** this lightweight shrug is easy and so cute it is a 3/4 length sleeve but could easily be lengthened the tie is in the middle **sizes** please note that due to the tie bust measurements are the smallest fit and will adjust about 2 inches larger - small 35 inch bust 15 inch top to bottom sleeve under arm 11 ½ inches - medium 36 ½ inch bust 15 inch top to bottom sleeve under arm 11 ½ inches - large - 38 inch bust 17 inch top to bottom sleeve under arm 12 - x-large - 39 ½ inch bust 17 inch top to bottom sleeve under arm 12 inches - 2x-large - 41 inch bust 17 ½ inch top to bottom sleeve under arm 12 ½ inches - 3x-large - 42 ½ inch bust 17 ½ inch top to bottom sleeve under arm 12 ½ inches - 4x-large 44 inch bust 18 inch top to bottom sleeve under arm 12 ½ inches
